hero.title: Techlympics 2025
hero.subtitle: Extraordinary, Global, Inclusive
hero.description: More than just a technological event or competition; it is a celebration of human ingenuity, creativity, and collaboration. It provides a unique platform for students, educators and tech enthusiasts to come together, learn, share ideas and inspire one another
about.title: About Techlympics 2025
about.subtitle: Celebrating technological innovation and excellence across Malaysia
about.description.part1: Malaysia Techlympics is a vital initiative that promotes the enculturation of Science, Technology, and Innovation (STI) across the nation. The annual Techlympics not only sparks interest in STI fields but also embeds the importance of innovation in the minds of young Malaysians.
about.description.part2: Malaysia Techlympics is an initiative under the Ministry of Science, Technology and Innovation (MOSTI).

cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, provide personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.
cookies.preferencesDescription: Manage your cookie preferences. Essential cookies cannot be disabled as they are necessary for the website to function properly.
cookies.essentialDescription: Required for basic functionality like security, authentication, and session management.
cookies.functionalDescription: Enhance functionality and personalization, such as language selection and preferences.
cookies.analyticsDescription: Help us improve by collecting anonymous information about how you use our website.
